# iosxr_radius_server (Resource)

This resource can manage the Radius Server configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_radius_server" "example" {
  hosts = [
    {
      address          = "10.1.1.1"
      auth_port        = 1812
      acct_port        = 1813
      timeout          = 120
      retransmit       = 5
      key_type_7       = "060506324F41584B"
      test_username    = "cisco"
      idle_time        = 30
      ignore_auth_port = true
      ignore_acct_port = true
    }
  ]
  key_type_7                                                    = "060506324F41584B"
  timeout                                                       = 120
  retransmit_retries                                            = 5
  load_balance_method_least_outstanding_batch_size              = 25
  load_balance_method_least_outstanding_ignore_preferred_server = true
  throttle_access                                               = 100
  throttle_access_timeout                                       = 5
  throttle_accounting                                           = 50
  deadtime                                                      = 10
  dead_criteria_time                                            = 10
  dead_criteria_tries                                           = 5
  source_port_extended                                          = true
  ipv4_dscp                                                     = "cs6"
  ipv6_dscp                                                     = "cs6"
  vsa_attribute_ignore_unknown                                  = true
  disallow_null_username                                        = true
  attribute_lists = [
    {
      name              = "ATTR-LIST-1"
      radius_attributes = "1,2,3,4,5"
      attribute_vendor_ids = [
        {
          id = 9
          vendor_types = [
            {
              vendor_type_id = 1
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  attribute_acct_session_id_prepend_nas_port_id             = true
  attribute_acct_multi_session_id_include_parent_session_id = true
  attribute_filter_id_11_default_direction                  = "inbound"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `attribute_acct_multi_session_id_include_parent_session_id` (Boolean) Include Acct-Multi-Session-Id attribute with Acct-Parent-Session-Id
- `attribute_acct_session_id_prepend_nas_port_id` (Boolean) Prepend Acct-Session-Id attribute with Nas-Port-Id
- `attribute_filter_id_11_default_direction` (String) Set the attribute default direction
  - Choices: `inbound`, `outbound`
- `attribute_lists` (Attributes List) List of Attribute Types (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--attribute_lists))
- `dead_criteria_time` (Number) Minimum time that must elapse since a response was received from this RADIUS server
  - Range: `1`-`120`
- `dead_criteria_tries` (Number) The minimum number of transmissions (original attempts plus retransmits) to this RADIUS server
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `deadtime` (Number) Time in minutes for which a RADIUS server will be marked dead
  - Range: `1`-`1440`
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `disallow_null_username` (Boolean) null-username
- `hosts` (Attributes List) Specify a RADIUS server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hosts))
- `ipv4_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `ipv6_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `load_balance_method_least_outstanding_batch_size` (Number) Batch size for selection of the server.
  - Range: `1`-`1500`
- `load_balance_method_least_outstanding_ignore_preferred_server` (Boolean) Disable preferred server for this Server Group
- `retransmit_disable` (Boolean) Disable Radius server retransmit
- `retransmit_retries` (Number) <1-100>  Number of retries for a transaction (default is 3)
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `source_port_extended` (Boolean) Extended
- `throttle_access` (Number) To flow control the number of access requests sent to a radius server
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `throttle_access_timeout` (Number) Specify the number of timeouts exceeding which a throttled access request is dropped
  - Range: `1`-`10`
- `throttle_accounting` (Number) To flow control the number of accounting requests sent to a radius server.
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for a RADIUS server to reply (default 5)
  - Range: `1`-`1000`
- `vsa_attribute_ignore_unknown` (Boolean) ignore the VSA and no prefix will reject the unkown VSA

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--attribute_lists"></a>
### Nested Schema for `attribute_lists`

Required:

- `name` (String) List of Attribute Types

Optional:

- `attribute_vendor_ids` (Attributes List) vendor-id (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--attribute_lists--attribute_vendor_ids))
- `radius_attributes` (String) Comma-delimited list of RADIUS attributes

<a id="nestedatt--attribute_lists--attribute_vendor_ids"></a>
### Nested Schema for `attribute_lists.attribute_vendor_ids`

Required:

- `id` (Number) vendor-id
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `vendor_types` (Attributes List) Specify vendor-type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--attribute_lists--attribute_vendor_ids--vendor_types))

<a id="nestedatt--attribute_lists--attribute_vendor_ids--vendor_types"></a>
### Nested Schema for `attribute_lists.attribute_vendor_ids.vendor_types`

Required:

- `vendor_type_id` (Number) Specify vendor-type
  - Range: `1`-`254`




<a id="nestedatt--hosts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `hosts`

Required:

- `acct_port` (Number) UDP port for RADIUS accounting requests (default is 1646)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `address` (String) IPv4/IPv6 address of RADIUS server
- `auth_port` (Number) UDP port for RADIUS authentication requests (default is 1645)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `order` (Number) This is used to sort the users in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `dtls_server_trustpoint` (String) Trustpoint to be used for RADIUS over DTLS
- `idle_time` (Number) Idle time after which automated test should start
  - Range: `1`-`60`
- `ignore_acct_port` (Boolean) Turn off automated testing on acct-port
- `ignore_auth_port` (Boolean) Turn off automated testing on auth-port
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `radsec_server_trustpoint` (String) Trustpoint to be used for RADIUS over TLS
- `retransmit` (Number) Number of times a RADIUS request is re-sent to a server (overrides global retransmit value)
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `test_username` (String) Username to be tested for automated testing
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for this RADIUS server to reply (overrides global timeout)
  - Range: `1`-`1000`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_radius_server.example ""
```
